fig.label: Figure 1
fig.sd-panel: mRNA expression of ANG in colonic tissues from normal controls (n = 25) and UC (n = 27) or CD (n = 46) patients.
Representative western blotting of ANG in colonic tissues from normal controls and UC or CD patients.
Representative images showing ANG immunohistochemical (IHC) staining in normal control and UC or CD sample.
Corresponding statistical analysis of ANG expression score in normal controls (n = 10) and UC (n = 10) or CD (n = 15) patients.
Representative images showing hematoxylin-eosin (HE) staining and ANG IHC staining in mild and severe IBD samples.
Statistical analyses of ANG expression scores in mild (n = 18) and severe (n = 19) UC (F) or mild (n = 20) and severe (n = 20) CD (G) patients.

fig.label: Figure 2
fig.sd-panel: Ang mRNA expression in colonic tissue from 2.5% DSS-treated WT mice at indicated time point (n = 4 mice/time point). DSS: dextran sulfate sodium
Kaplan-Meier curve of 3.5% DSS-treated Ang-deficient mice (Ang-/-, n = 14) or littermate controls (WT, n = 13).
Body weight loss of WT and Ang-/- mice with (n = 9) or without (n = 6) 2.5% DSS treatment.
disease activity index (DAI) of WT and Ang-/- mice with (n = 9) or without (n = 6) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Colon length of colonic section from the WT and Ang-/- mice on day 9 with (n = 9) or without (n = 6) 2.5% DSS treatment.
serum FITC-Dextran level of colonic section from the WT and Ang-/- mice on day 9 with (n = 9) or without (n = 6) 2.5% DSS treatment. FITC-Dextran: fluorescein isothiocyanate-labeled dextran.
representative HE staining image, and (H) histopathological score of colonic section from the WT and Ang-/- mice on day 9 with (n = 9) or without (n = 6) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Quantitative mRNA expression of cytokine genes in colonic tissue from the WT and Ang-/- mice on day 0 (n = 3) or day 9 (n = 9) during 2.5% DSS treatment.
Soluble cytokine level in supernatant of cultured colonic tissue isolated from WT and Ang-/- mice on day 0 (n = 3) or day 9 (n = 7) during 2.5% DSS treatment.

fig.label: Figure 3
fig.sd-panel: Body weight loss of WT→WT, Ang-/-→WT and WT→Ang-/- chimera mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
DAI of WT→WT, Ang-/-→WT and WT→Ang-/- chimera mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Colon length of colonic section from these chimera colitis mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
serum FITC-Dextran level, of colonic section from these chimera colitis mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
representative HE staining image, and (F) histopathological score of colonic section from these chimera colitis mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Ang mRNA expression in mouse lymphoid and myeloid cells; data represent two independent experiments (n = 2).
Body weight loss of Angfl/fl and LyzMcre;Angfl/fl mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 3) 2.5% DSS treatment.
DAI of Angfl/fl and LyzMcre;Angfl/fl mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 3) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Colon length of colonic section from the Angfl/fl and LyzMcre;Angfl/fl mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 3) 2.5% DSS treatment.
serum FITC-Dextran level, of colonic section from the Angfl/fl and LyzMcre;Angfl/fl mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 3) 2.5% DSS treatment.
representative HE staining image, and (M) histopathological score of colonic section from the Angfl/fl and LyzMcre;Angfl/fl mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 3) 2.5% DSS treatment.

fig.label: Figure 4
fig.sd-panel: Quantitative mRNA expression of ANG and PLXNB2 in isolated IECs or colonic laminar propria (cLP) cells from WT mice (n = 9).
western blotting of ANG and PLXNB2 in isolated IECs or colonic laminar propria (cLP) cells from WT mice (n = 9).
Representative images showing immunofluorescence staining of ANG, PLXNB2 and macrophage surface marker F4/80 in frozen colonic section from WT mice.
Representative images showing immunofluorescence staining of GFP and PLXNB2 in frozen colonic section from WT mice infected with adeno-associated virus (AAV9).
PLXNB2 expression in IECs from the AAV9-infected WT mice (n = 3).
Body weight loss of the AA9-infected WT mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
DAI of the AA9-infected WT mice with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
Colon length of colonic section from the AAV9-infected WT mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
serum FITC-Dextran level of colonic section from the AAV9-infected WT mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.
representative HE staining image, and (K) histopathological score of colonic section from the AAV9-infected WT mice on day 8 with (n = 7) or without (n = 5) 2.5% DSS treatment.

fig.label: Figure 5
fig.sd-panel: Representative images showing cleaved-caspase 3 staining in colonic section from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 3) at indicated time point; arrows indicate cleaved-caspase 3 positive cells; two fields per colon section are quantified.
the number of apoptotic cells in colonic section from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 3) at indicated time point
Cell apoptotic status of IECs from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 5) on day 4.
Cell apoptotic status of IECs from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 5) on day 4.
Representative images showing Ki67 staining in colonic section from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 3) at indicated time point; five representative crypts per colon section are quantified.
the number of proliferating cells per crypt in colonic section from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 3) at indicated time point; five representative crypts per colon section are quantified.
Cell-cycle status of IECs from WT or Ang-/- colitis mice (n = 5) on day 4.

Representative images showing cleaved-caspase 3 staining in colonic section from Angfl/fl and LyzMCre;Angfl/fl, or AAV-shControl- and AAV-shPlxnb2- treated colitis mice on day 4 (n = 3); arrows indicate cleaved-caspase 3 positive cells; two fields per colon section are quantified.
the number of apoptotic cells in colonic section from Angfl/fl and LyzMCre;Angfl/fl, or AAV-shControl- and AAV-shPlxnb2- treated colitis mice on day 4 (n = 3)

Ki67 staining and (L) the number of proliferating cells per crypt in representative colonic section from Angfl/fl and LyzMCre;Angfl/fl, or AAV-shControl- and AAV-shPlxnb2- treated colitis mice on day 4 (n = 3); five representative crypts per colon section are quantified.

fig.label: Figure 6
fig.sd-panel: PLXNB2 expressions in HCT116 (including wild type HCT116 (HCT116WT) and ANG knockout HCT116 (HCT116KO)) and THP-1 as detected by flow cytometry analysis. The upper three dash lines represent the intensity of unstained negative control of these cells, while the solid lines represent the intensity of PLXNB2 antibody staining.
Secreted ANG level in conditioned medium from THP1, HCT116WT or HCT116KO (n = 3).

The interaction between ANGWT, ANGR66A or ANGK40I with PLXNB2 in HCT116KO detected by co-immunoprecipitation assay. ANGR66A, ANG receptor binding site variant; ANGK40I, ANG enzymatic activity null variant

THP-1-derived ANG translocating into HCT116KO through PLXNB2 in co-cultured system as showed by western blotting. Neamine, a blocker of ANG and PLXNB2 interaction; siCtrl: control siRNA; siPLXNB2-1 and siPLXNB2-2

Flow cytometry analysis of HCT116KO stained with Annexin V and PI following different treatments as indicated. ANGR66A, ANG receptor binding site variant; ANGK40I, ANG enzymatic activity null variant; BAY, inhibitor of TNF-α-induced κB kinase (IKK) phosphorylation

tiRNA and 5'-tiRNAAla production in HCT116KO following different treatments as indicated. ANGR66A, ANG receptor binding site variant; ANGK40I, ANG enzymatic activity null variant; BAY, inhibitor of TNF-α-induced κB kinase (IKK) phosphorylation
The effect of 5'-tiRNA knockdown or overexpression on TNF-α-induced apoptosis in ANGWT- or ANGK40I-treated HCT116KO. si5'-tiRNA: tiRNA-targeting siRNA
The interaction between 5'-tiRNA and cytochrome c (Cyt c) in HCT116 cells as detected by RIP.

Caspase activity of HCT116KO following different treatments as indicated. ANGR66A, ANG receptor binding site variant; ANGK40I, ANG enzymatic activity null variant; BAY, inhibitor of TNF-α-induced κB kinase (IKK) phosphorylation
Cell viability of HCT116KO following different treatments as indicated. siCtrl: control siRNA; siPLXNB2-1 and siPLXNB2-2: PLXNB2 siRNAs
Detection of 47S pre-rRNA transcription level with northern blotting in HCT116KO following different treatments as indicated. siPLXNB2-1 and siPLXNB2-2: PLXNB2 siRNAs
tiRNA and 5'-tiRNAAla production in IECs isolated from WT and Ang-/- colitis mice at indicated time point.
47S pre-rRNA transcription level in IECs from WT and Ang-/- colitis mice at indicated time point.

fig.label: Figure 7
fig.sd-panel: Schematic diagram of the ANG prevention model. Mice (n = 8) were pre-treated with 1.25 mg/kg recombinant ANG protein and then subjected to DSS induction.

Western blotting of ANG in colonic tissue from WT mice (n = 2) at indicated time point in the ANG prevention model. The grayscale of ANG band in WT mice with no recombinant ANG and DSS treatment (untreated) is arbitrarily set as 1.
Body weight loss of the pre-treated WT colitis mice (n = 8).
DAI of the pre-treated WT colitis mice (n = 8).
Colon length of colon section from the pre-treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
serum FITC-dextran level of colon section from the pre-treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
representative HE staining image, and (H) histopathological score of colon section from the pre-treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
Schematic diagram of the ANG treatment model. Mice (n = 8) were treated with DSS for 7 days, and simultaneously administrated with 1.25 mg/kg recombinant ANG during day 4-6.

Western blotting of ANG in colonic tissue from WT (n = 2) mice at indicated time point in the ANG treatment model. The grayscale of ANG band in WT mice with no recombinant ANG and DSS treatment (untreated) is arbitrarily set as 1.
Body weight loss of the treated WT colitis mice (n = 8).
DAI of the treated WT colitis mice (n = 8).
Colon length of colon sections from the treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
serum FITC-dextran level of colon sections from the treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
representative HE staining image, and (P) histopathological score of colon sections from the treated WT colitis mice on day 8 (n = 8).
